options.name: Arcane Scholar
options.description: Your dedication to magical study is unmatched. Gain +1 skill with academics. Your academic foundation is so broad, when you help an ally by using your academics skill, you grant them 2 bonus dice if you are successful.

options.name: Theoretical Mastery
options.description: Your mind processes magical formulae with machine-like precision. Gain +1 skill with concentration. You can continue a ritual that you prematurely ended as long as you restart within 6 hours of ending it without a penalty.

options.name: Scribe
options.description: Ancient runes and mystical symbols flow from your quill like water. Gain +1 skill with glyphcraft and become proficient in one magical language.

options.name: Arcane Mana
options.description: You've learned to tap into pure magical essence. You gain 3 mana points that refresh after a full rest. When channeling a spell, you can spend 1 mana point to charge the spell.

options.name: Researcher
options.description: Your spell research is unparalleled. Gain +1 skill with magic. Once per day, when researching a spell, you do not suffer the penalty for not knowing it.

options.name: Structured Mind
options.description: A wizard's mind must be sharp to keep a large selection of spells. Gain +1 skill with logic. You never truly forget spells; instead you can switch out spells that you know with any spell that you knew in the past at the end of a full rest.

options.name: Action : Mana Burn
options.description: You channel all remaining mana you have available, rolling a d10 for each point against a resilience defense check. For each success, you deal 5 aetheric damage and 8 damage if a 10 is rolled.

options.name: Elemental Theorist
options.description: Your mastery extends to the fundamental forces. Gain +1 skill with primal magic.

options.name: Metaphysical Study
options.description: You've mastered the art of bending reality itself. Gain +1 skill with metamagic.

options.name: Archmage
options.description: You gain 2 additional mana points and gain +3 spell capacity. Additionally, the dice on your Mana Burn action becomes a d12.
